name: Melinda Meszaros
what_you_do: I practice and teach tools that enable people's conscious and non-conscious mind to work synergistically, so that they are able to access its full power no matter what is going on in their life. I specialize in deep inner work, helping people discover and transform hidden beliefs, subconscious programs and realign relationships.
who_you_serve: I help clients uncover and reshape the hidden landscape of their mind, paving the way for a leap in personal growth and a more expansive and fulfilling life.
social_proof: Melinda has natural talents and instincts for energy work which she infuses with her intelligence to do unique sessions. I am a blessed recipient of her very detailed and caring service. Through her sessions, Melinda has quickly discovered challenges and obstacles in me that years of psychological therapy likely would not have ever uncovered.
business_focus: Helping people access the full power of their conscious and non-conscious mind through deep inner work and transformational tools.
